pokerapp.console.turns

Class ComputerPlayerTurn

  • Object
    • ComputerPlayerTurn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConsolePlayerTurn

    public class ComputerPlayerTurn
extends Object
implements ConsolePlayerTurn

    Handles the console-based ComputerPlayer turn. This essentially means that it logs events to the console.
